attributes.action: Increase the smoking age each year so smoking will eventually be eliminated.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is proving difficult to wean smokers off tobacco so it makes sense to prevent smoking in the first place.
Revenue from tobacco tax would drop slowly and in time we would become a smoke-free society.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
